stanza.line: O thou my lovely boy who in thypower
Dost hold Time fickle glass his ficklehour
Who hast by waning grown and thereinshow
Thy lovers withering as thy sweet selfgrow
As thou goest onwards still will pluck theeback
She keeps thee to this purpose that herskill
May time disgrace and wretched minuteskill
Yet fear her O thou minion of herpleasure
She may detain but not still keep hertreasure
Her audit though delayed answered mustbe
And her quietus is to renderthee
